ScoriaPy documentation
======================

ScoriaPy is a lightweight utility library built on top of Scanpy.
It organizes helpers into Scanpy-style namespaces:

* :mod:`scoriapy.pp` – preprocessing / IO utilities
* :mod:`scoriapy.tl` – analysis tools
* :mod:`scoriapy.pl` – plotting utilities
* :mod:`scoriapy.utils` – generic helpers
